Entries.Caroline: I wish {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}} would spend this time with the family...$s
Entries.Clint: I wonder if {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}} would dance with me?
Entries.Kent: This open field... it makes me nervous.#$e#*whisper* Happy thoughts, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentName}}. Happy Thoughts.
Entries.Elliott: I wore my best {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Shirt:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottGender}}}} for the dance... This sort of thing doesn't happen very often!
